channel.title: Cloudfront on SpiderSoft
channel.description: Recent content in Cloudfront on SpiderSoft

item.title: How to host static website on AWS CloudFront
item.description: I was looking for a way to host a static website on AWS. I found a couple of ways to do that. I decided to use CloudFront as a CDN and S3 as an origin. I will show you how to do that.
